message.body: Hi Nellie! It's Lindsey. I was wondering if you would be interested in having my small couch. Otherwise I am going to donate it. Let me know!
I would love to see it. Whenever you're around. I glanced at it that morning I was at your place......thank you so much for the consideration.
Sure! I will be in and out of the apartment cleaning tomorrow and Sunday. I'll leave the door open and you can come up and take a look!
